Entries.default: The cauldron nestled in the center of the witches' hut is filled with a foul, bubbling brew.

You follow the directions you gleaned from the witches' notes. After cobbling together the necessary ingredients and dumping them into the cauldron as directed, you take your first tentative sip.

You immediately feel faster and more nimble.

You follow the directions you gleaned from the witches' notes. After cobbling together the necessary ingredients and dumping them into the cauldron as directed, you take your first tentative sip.

You immediately feel tougher and more resilient.

You immediately feel tougher and more vital.

You follow the directions you gleaned from the witches' notes. After cobbling together the necessary ingredients and dumping them into the cauldron as directed, you take your first tentative sip.

You immediately feel more insightful and observant.

You follow the directions you gleaned from the witches' notes. After cobbling together the necessary ingredients and dumping them into the cauldron as directed, you take your first tentative sip.

You immediately feel more clever and creative than ever before in your life.

A hulking cauldron squats at the center of the witches' hut. Arcane symbols are etched across its surface in precise lines.

Though clearly enchanted to serve some larger purpose, you're unsure what that is.

A hulking cauldron squats at the center of the witches' hut. Arcane symbols are etched across its surface in precise lines.

The witches' notes have taught you how to use the cauldron to make potions... if you have the correct ingredients.

You follow the directions you gleaned from the witches' notes. After cobbling together the necessary ingredients and dumping them into the cauldron as directed, you take your first tentative sip.

You immediately feel more bold and resolute.
